title: Credit Karma Is Lying to You (Here's the Truth)
script:
[HOOK - 0-3 seconds]
Credit Karma is lying to you. [PAUSE] And it's costing you thousands.

[ATTENTION - 3-15 seconds]
You check your Credit Karma score. It says 720. You're feeling good. You go to buy a house. The lender pulls your credit. [PAUSE] 680. What happened?

[INTEREST - 15-35 seconds]
Here's the truth nobody tells you. Credit Karma uses VantageScore 3.0. Mortgage lenders use FICO Score 2. [PAUSE] That's FORTY years of difference in algorithm technology.

VantageScore counts your rent and utilities. FICO doesn't. That's why you see a 20 to 50 point difference. [PAUSE] But here's the kicker â€” the lender doesn't care about Credit Karma's number.

[DESIRE - 35-60 seconds]
I see this every day. People think they're ready to buy. They've been watching their Credit Karma score for months. Then they get denied. [PAUSE] Or worse, they get hit with higher interest rates because their REAL score is lower.

A 40-point difference can cost you $200 more per month on your mortgage. [PAUSE] Over 30 years? That's $72,000 you're throwing away because you trusted the wrong number.

[ACTION - 60-75 seconds]
Stop guessing. Get your actual FICO scores for free. I've put together a complete guide that shows you exactly where to get them, plus the 3 other mistakes killing your credit.

Link in bio. [PAUSE] Download it now before you apply for anything.

[OUTRO]
Follow for more credit truths they don't want you to know.
